articles.title: 2 Killed In Blasts Near Gurdwara In Kabul, India Says "Deeply Concerned"
articles.description: Two people - a Sikh devotee and an Afghan guard - have died and several trapped in a Gurdwara in Afghanistan's capital Kabul after two blasts rocked the city this morning. The blasts took place near the gates of the Gurdwara.
